name: Husky Harry & The Bones of Merlin
name_original: Husky Harry & The Bones of Merlin
description:
A frantic race against time, running, jumping and swimming through a wild and beautiful land guarded by immortal boulder-hurling monsters to find 10 hidden magical bones — the only thing that can save your dying master from a witch's spiteful curse.... and he only has minutes to live! Will you be able to find the bones in time and remember how to get home?

—

This is the first iteration beta of the first-ever project from new solo indie dev Matt Mahalo (Karmai.co) who has absolutely no idea what he's doing and used a lot of loud curse words in the process of making this game! lol
